website_summaries.verdict: The Ecco Cool 2.0 Textile GTX is one example that a sporty-looking casual shoe can be comfortable, stylish, and innovative all at the same time. Purchasers gave nothing but excellent reviews on this shoe’s overall performance, comfort, and fit. Its stylish façade makes it, even more, a fitting pair to buy. Creative elements are seen through its KPU grid detailing and distinctive TPU tubes along the midsole - factors that buyers deem desirable as they are also functional. Overall, this is another highly recommended sneaker from the Danish shoe brand.
pros: The Ecco Cool 2.0 Textile GTX impressed many buyers for its appealing style
Some even claimed that it is more fashionable than the earlier version of the Ecco Cool
Numerous purchasers applauded the Gore-Tex waterproof feature of this shoe that unquestionably kept their feet dry all the time
One reviewer further highlighted that, as a test, she submerged this shoe in a pool and it was able to keep her feet waterproof
This low-top has excellent comfort, claimed by many buyers
It is a great shoe to wear for walking
Some users took note of the superb quality of this shoe that is at par with other Ecco shoes
A couple of reviewers stated that this textile version of the Ecco Cool 2.0 GTX is breathable despite being waterproof
A few reviewers mentioned that they prefer this textile version over the leather Ecco 2.0 because of its breathability
The textile material also gives more flexibility and not as restrictive
The majority of the reviewers said that this shoe fits true to size
One impressed reviewer highlighted that the sole of this shoe is very shock absorbing
A small number of reviewers observed that the traction of this version is much better than the Ecco Cool's because its sole has deeper lugs
cons: Limited colorways are available for the Ecco Cool 2.0 Textile GTX
This Ecco shoe retails at a bit expensive price range
A few reviewers found the width of this shoe a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfy too!
customer_reviews.text: When I took them out of the box I thought they looked small but they're just a very neat shoe, not big and clunky. These days I find most shoes too wide but these are great. The beetroot colour is more raspberry. The top is a sort of fabric and doesn't press down on my poor hammer toes. And they make me taller - what more could I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kaywire

customer_reviews.title: Great water proof sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love Ecco shoes. The fit is relatively narrow which suits my feet and their sizing is just a little bit bigger than a standard UK size - not a full half size - just a little bit bigger. Very comfortable. Expensive, but worth it if you walk a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Panna

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough to wear to football games and walk the dog!
customer_reviews.text: it's an attractive and comfortable shoe. It fits well although when first trying it on, was worried they felt a little tight. But after a few wears they are very comfortable and look good too ( well people have admired that and asked for the make).
customer_reviews.author: Zander

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have replaced the insoles for something with a little more arch support as I have plantar fasciitis. But they are definitely more attractive than the Asics trainers I normally have to wear. So, if like me, you have little choice in the footwear you can actually walk in, I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Oh so comfortable. Well made and arrived on time. I would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PMF

customer_reviews.title: brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and lovely trainer, but with the added luxury of leather being the material used, so often it is not. Good price and excellent walking shoe. thanks x
customer_reviews.author: Miss J & J

customer_reviews.title: These have to be one of the best pair of trainers l have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These have to be one of the best pair of trainers l have ever purchased. They are so comfortable and l love them. I love them so much I've ordered another pair in red. Which has to be a pretty good recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Trendygirl

customer_reviews.title: They are truly waterproof and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Quite expensive pair of shoes but they do the job. They are truly waterproof and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Izabela

customer_reviews.title: ECCO are the best
customer_reviews.text: Good looking trainers! Fit really well and feel supportive. Can wear all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jayne Luce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe delivered online on time
customer_reviews.text: After much research for a light weight walking shoe that didn’t look too clumsy and old fashioned I found these
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Ecco cool.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and looks nice! Would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them in department store. Fit size. Goretex. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danish design at its best.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as expected from Ecco topclass quality in leather and design.
customer_reviews.author: Peter ibsen

customer_reviews.title: really comfy and good quality ones
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers are exactly as I was looking for, really comfy and good quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tatjana

customer_reviews.title: but seem really nice quality, and very very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but seem really nice quality, and very very comfortable. I wear them most of the time at present.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beware laces do not undo down towards the toes
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to receiving these trainers but sadly, as the laces do not undo right down the front, I could not get my feet into them. They also looked quite narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Welshy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfy and high quality pair of shoes. ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfy and high quality pair of shoes. Just mind that they slightly oversized. My size is 39, but had to go for 38 with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: ECCO Women's Cool 2.0 Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Design meets premium construction in this women's casual shoe. Soft leather with perforations creates a sporty, on-trend look, but thanks to the gore-tex® surround™ water stays outside, keeping feet dry all day long. A durable two colored TPU outsole is grippy on uneven and slippery terrain, so you can step out in confidence.
feature_bullets: Textile upper with a supportive PU-grid offers high breathability and durability
Highly breathable textile lining ensures an optimal climate for your feet
A direct-injected PU foam and foot-fitted last provide long-lasting cushioning and outstanding walking comfort
GORE-TEX SURROUND waterproof construction and air channels in the midsole increase breathability from all angles
Durable two-colored TPU outsole for outstanding flexibility and all-day comfort
